Mosha Says...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Storyline Topics: Mosha Says...
By John Hawley on Sunday, September 30, 2001 - 04:41 pm:

That the Characteristic "Hard Scales" reduces your speed, but it also reduces the damage opponents can do to you.

By John Hawley on Tuesday, October 2, 2001 - 05:19 pm:

Mitia says, "I notice that monsters are wearing 'Mushrooms' as accessories. If you search in Morx, you should find some."

By Crystal Pixie on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 05:30 pm:

Yeah, and before battle Date says, "I think a little handicap will make things more exiting." What on earth does this mean?

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 10:05 pm:

i think it means that your monster is so much better than his, that it evens things out, because he considers himself a better trainer than you. or, as my dad used to say when he was way behind in a game to one of us kids..."ok, the games even now, based on the players."

By danz on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 10:41 pm:

yeah, i find that when fleria says "our monster is FAR/much etc. stronger," then your rivals will say something along the lines of "do you really want to fight with a monster like that?" or something. does this affect their feelings of you and your "relationship"? (if one exists)
